description: Only $759,999 for over 2,000 sq ft townhouse w/ AC, double side-by-side garage + double car driveway!!! Living space on all 3 levels! Great deck—perfect for morning coffee or evening BBQs (has a gas hook up). 3 bed and 3.5 bath, there’s comfort and privacy for everyone. The large rec room is ideal for a home theatre, gym, or playroom, while the cozy yard provides low-maintenance outdoor space for kids, pets, or gardening, double garage with Car charging unit! access to an amenity house (30-40 people) bookable for just $50 a day! Steps away from the Mission Leisure Centre and a short distance to the West Coast Express, you’ll enjoy easy access to recreation, commuting, shopping, schools, and parks. A perfect blend of space, convenience, and lifestyle. LIVE where you feel free!
